content: Don't be scammed by paying for this app. Basic is ¬£30 a month, and doesn't let you see likes. So it's worthless. And supposedly I have 94 lines, which we all know about 70 of those will be fake accounts or people in totally random countries. Best part, despite having exhausted all profiles the app has asked me to look at, I still somehow have 94 likes. On profiles I have no way of accessing without paying another ¬£30 for premium. SCAM. There are much better, cheaper dating apps out there.
They will bombard you with tons of likes from outside the country like the Philippines. When you ask for a refund they will pretend they don't have your account information. Biggest scam ever.

App is filled with bots and fake profiles. Good luck if you live in a city. You will never get matches or recommended matches in your own city. I live on the east coast and all of my recommend matches were from New York, even if I set the distance at 5 miles. Truly garbage of an app, as if I didn't have matches in my own state. Waste of time. Trust me.
I spent a lot of money to subscribe to this app, and I have not gotten one real match. Lots of bots and fake accounts.

Every time I think MatchGroup can't make this app any worse, they find a way. Now there's popup ads, a persistent notification that does nothing, image loading is slow & removed the lines that tell when when you or someone else marked a question as important. They require your phone number but still have done nothing to stop scammers. Don't bother signing up, it improves nothing & fake matches show up as soon as your sub is over. The app is just a scam at this point.
Paid for premium, and everyone that "liked" was from another continent. Absolutely scam!

Save your money. App makes you use your mobile device to get an SMS code to log in, its a requirement even if you use your email or laptop to access your account. A week after I paid for a membership it decide to stop recognizing my phone number for no apparent reason and now I cannot log in. Custom service was no help, all they did was send me a screenshot of the instructions that are already on the website. So I lost my 44 bucks and have no access now. Its a scam please do not use this site.
App fraud. I cant choose X for anyone whos send me intros. So i must ‚ù§Ô∏è thats annoying

A bit of a scam. You have to pay to see who likes you, but it turns out they're all from other countries. I think they trick you into paying for the app using this method. Seems quite sleazy to me. They also show you the same people again and again, no matter how many times you say no to them. I've said no to one of my exes 3 times. Update: I've now seen my ex 8 times. They show the same profiles again and again and again...
Only fake profiles (bots), just time waste

Update 11/26/2024: What a disappointment to see this app overrun with greed and fraud. Changing from 5 stars to 1 because you've destroyed an entire community. Shame on you all. Good way to meet real people. The questionnaire makes it easy to tell about yourself when you don't know what to say.
So many fake profiles and it seems they promote scammers/fakes and don't do anything about it so that you have to buy premium

Firstly this app is very expensive. When you are a premium member the preference features still don't filter your "match" correctly. There are many fake profiles and let's not forget the boring ridiculous questions to find your match. There are much better and cheaper dating apps out there.

This app is essentially useless for domestic American matches. I stupidly wasted over a hundred dollars in order to view likes and respond to prospective matches. The likes I received were all profiles from foreign countries, all people looking to hook an American to gain citizenship. Don't pay, and don't fall for fake likes.

Used to be a pretty ok dating app (get it?), but now it's all fake profiles from Asia and Africa and people you've already swiped left on like 4 times already. Notifications for nothing and intros you can't delete. I would say no joke like 1 in 20 profiles is actually someone near you that you could meet. And no I don't need a reply from customer service telling me to contact your email address, it's not my responsibility to fix your app.
The amount of fake accounts in this app is unbelievable, i don't recommend using the app
its 100% fake app.I have tested it.
Please don't waste your Money boys, it's a scam üíØ
I regret ever subscribing to this app, üò™ üò´, I never been able to used it Since then, and 99% of the profile are fake,

DO NOT GET APP, MESSAGES DO NOT WORK. All the features that made this app usable have been removed. It is so bad now, even paying customers are getting advertisements for match, and also can't see all relivant info on likes. The app is now a bugie mess full of fake and inactive accounts, and thanks to the most recent upfront, messages don't send half time.

Cheaters and fraud. Subscribed for premium subscription. My profile is not working since last two days. All fake profiles from Indonesia and Africa. After emailing several times there was no response. Case id (10724316)

Back in the day the website was decent. Today, this app is nothing but ripping you off. Even if you pay for the service. I've had it 2 weeks not a single person has contacted me. Furthermore, the only people that like you are foreign scam artists. Don't waste your time or money!

SCAM ! DO NOT USE or give your credit card. Used to be a great app 6 years ago. Now it takes your card and locks you out, claiming that they can't send you an SMS message and that they can't fix the bug. You can ask to delete account, but they will rudely say so what. Cancel your credit card and be very careful. They advertised a free plenty of fish on the app inside OKC ,which is also a scam for more money. WARN EVERYONE
scam like all of them : )
Ich komme aus Berlin doch ich sehe nur Leute aus Asien obwohl ich ein 20km radius eingestellt habe. Leider nur fake Profile.

Broken app full of bugs, full of scammers, fake profiles of women, full of women who aren't interested in a real relationship who just link their Instagram, like ffs just ban people who put their Instagram in their profile and the most obvious fake scammer profiles how hard can that be
Worst app Never join. Here lot of fake things going on

Besides spamming you with ads for other aps when you pay for okcupid it's 90% of the likes are from kenya and the Philippines, the app baits you with fake likes so you'll see 99+ likes frequently. I purchased premium to see what's really happening and you only match with like ten people a month, the rest are bots.

The app will continue to charge you even after deleting and removing my credit card info and canceling the subscription. Full of fake accounts, the company is as bad as the scammers online. They only want your money.

Dont waste your money, I've been on here before and paid like a idiot, but this time was the last straw and getting my money back. I've been active on here for 3 days and got 72 likes!! I'm like, nah, this is a scam, has to be.. well, I dropped $44 to see my likes. By the way, it's $10 extra now! And behold all the spam profiles in the world.. 1 like out of 72 was from my area, all the rest over seas, don't waste your time, I know people have luck but it's just ridiculous of the cost now.
Plagued with bots, fake profiles and people from Africa and Asia pretending they're local.
Too many scammers, fake. and inactive account, clean them up please.

Used to be good, you get dupe account after swiping on them, has alot of people from "asia" even though it says they're local which I think is some kind of weird scam. And they've monitied the hell out of the app. Sad part is its prolly the best one from match group.

Seems more legit than most, 90% seem overweight looking for love. Still requires pay wall to chat. Don't pay to view likes, you will find it's all fake likes from girls that look like models. Then you need to pay again to chat to find out they are just bots and fantasy profiles. Reverse search 1 image, and it came back a real model, she wouldn't be on this app looking for a connection. It's someone pretending to get you to pay for membership.

Close to 50% of profiles are fake in that they lie about their location. I'm in Canada and that half will be in the Philippines or South America, etc. Oh and there's hardly any real/local profiles on the app. I ran out of people in only a few days lol.

Pretty sure it's a scam to get guys to buy add-ons. Two separate attempts at the app. Zero connections or even replies. The app continues to try to get me to buy more "super likes". I have no evidence that anyone even receives the messages I send. This is the only dating app I've tried with absolute NO likes, responses, or connections. I like that there are options for non-monogamy, which is why I give it 2 stars as opposed to 1.
Get ready for whole bunch of likes from fake people no where near where you're from. It's a scam don't pay for the premium you will get scam likes a WHOLE MESS LOAD OF SCAM LIKES!!!

Your profile is visible to everyone in the world if they click Passport mode, and you have NO control over this! This is completely unacceptable... the user must have the ability to limit who can see their profile by proximity. As it is, you get constant useless Likes from people from all corners of the planet. Not to mention the exponentially higher risk of spam and scam when billions of people can potentially see your profile. I'm done with this app if this doesn't change. otherwise, nice app

4 years ago I gave 5star but right now giving 2 stars because they limited free account swipes between 5 swipe to 10 swipe per day. Ridiculous. That is how you lost real people and replacing them with deleted accounts or fake accounts!!! get yourself together Okcupid!!

Total scam. This has the exact same profiles as other dating app. It's a longshot finding a profile that's active and real. App is glitchy. I can clearly see that I have likes but it won't allow me to click on it and see who they are instead it tells me to boost my profile for extra dollars. Ripp off. Not happy with this at all.
